entries.stacksize: Enter the size of the new stack.
entries.invalid: You did not enter a valid size for the new stack.
entries.zero_size: You must enter a stack size larger than zero.
entries.too_big: The new stack cannot be larger than the old stack.
entries.full_container: That container is full. There's no room to split this stack.
entries.bad_container: Unable to create a new stack in that container.
entries.number_format_wrong: The number entered was not correct. Make sure to enter non-negative whole numbers.
